intro: Solve fun Piczle logic puzzles created from the world of Rune Factory!
description:
Based on the world and characters of Rune Factory 3 Special, 4 Special and 5, work your way through hundreds of puzzles.
Complete puzzles to unlock the real-world counterparts and use them to customise your farm, plant vegetables, recruit monsters, and choose your farm location to create your own unique Rune Factory 3D scene!

Select your weapon and go head-to-head in puzzle battles with the monsters from Rune Factory. A right move will deal damage on the monster, but a wrong move will inflict damage on you. Can you solve the puzzle before your time is up?

As you complete the puzzles and capture monsters, a compendium of characters and bestiary of monsters unlocks, where you can view everybody's likes and dislikes, as well as view all monsters in 3D.

There is also a journal to track your progress and a music player to listen to the 60+ included tracks from Rune Factory 3 Special, 4 Special and 5. 

You can even choose a marriage partner from the bachelors you uncover.

Choose if you’d like to solve a puzzle as either black & white, colour, or both, in challenge mode or play at your own pace!

Features
* Gorgeous 3D art from Rune Factory 3 Special, Rune Factory 4 Special, and Rune Factory 5.
* 450 puzzles you can play as either black & white or colour nonograms!
* 20 collage puzzles, made up of many smaller puzzles, both in classic and colour variations!
* Fight and capture monsters!
* Uncover villagers and bachelors!
* Unlock entries in the in-game Bestiary and learn more about the monsters of Rigbarth!
* Detailed play statistics for the most ardent nonogram fanatics!
* Play how you want: laid-back and relaxed or challenging!
* Controller and touch-screen input
* A wealth of puzzle options to tweak the experience to your exact liking!
* Accessibility options, including dyslexia font, colour vision support and left or right-handed touch screen interface.
* 40 special achievements to unlock!
